name: Differential optical shadow sensor for sub-nanometer displacement measurement and its application to drag-free satellites
description: The journal article "Differential optical shadow sensor for sub-nanometer displacement measurement and its application to drag-free satellites" was published by Andreas Zoellner et al on Tue Oct 03 2017 in Optics Express
